flawed_nl_solution:
Marc watches 50 * 1/10 = <<50*1/10=500/1>>500/1 episodes a day.
So, he will need 50 / 500/1 = <<50/500/1=1/10>>1/10 days to finish all episodes he bought.
#### 1/10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 500/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
